text: Lin Xiyu (林希妤) (born 25 February 1996), also known as Xi Yu Lin, is a Chinese professional golfer. Lin turned professional in 2011 and began playing on the China LPGA Tour. She has won seven times on the CLPGA. She began playing on the Ladies European Tour in 2013 and has two wins on the tour the Sanya Ladies Open in 2014 and 2015. She began playing on the LPGA Tour in 2014 with a best finish of T-5 at the 2015 Blue Bay LPGA. Lin has made multiple holes-in-one on the LPGA Tour. Lin competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics, finishing 38th. ==Professional wins== ===Ladies European Tour wins=== *2014 Sanya Ladies Open^ *2015 Sanya Ladies Open^ ===China LPGA Tour wins=== *2012 (2) Tian Jing Challenge, Srixon XXIO Ladies Open *2013 (1) Sanya's Hills Ladies Classic *2014 (2) Sanya's Hills Ladies Classic, Sanya Ladies Open^ *2015 (1) Sanya Ladies Open^ *2019 (1) Macalline Women's China Open ^ Co-sanctioned by Ladies European Tour, Ladies Asian Golf Tour and China LPGA Tour. ===ALPG Tour wins=== *2018 ALPG Ballarat Icons Pro Am ==Team appearances== Professional *International Crown (representing China): 2016 ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Chinese female golfers Category:LPGA Tour golfers Category:Ladies European Tour golfers Category:Olympic golfers of China Category:Golfers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in golf Category:Asian Games silver medalists for China Category:Golfers at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Sportspeople from Guangzhou Category:1996 births Category:Living people
title: Lin Xiyu
